# spineLocation

**Instance Property**

The location of the spine.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var spineLocation: UIPageViewController.SpineLocation { get }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is set with the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewController/OptionsKey/spineLocation] key when the page view controller is initialized, and can be changed by returning the new value from the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPageViewControllerDelegate/pageViewController(_:spineLocationFor:)] method of the delegate.

## Display Options

- **navigationOrientation**: The direction along which navigation occurs.
- **UIPageViewController.NavigationOrientation**: Orientations for page-turn transitions.
- **UIPageViewController.SpineLocation**: Locations for the spine.
- **transitionStyle**: The style used to transition between view controllers.
- **UIPageViewController.TransitionStyle**: Styles for the page-turn transition.
- **isDoubleSided**: A Boolean value that indicates whether content appears on the back of pages.
